short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lyn Analytics Designed for Faire research to analyze the market better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lyn Analytics for Faire enables sellers to do advanced market research in order to optimize their brand page, listings and enhance Faire browsing experiences. Whether you are a eCommerce market researcher, Faire seller or just exploring the Faire marketplace; this extension can improve your experience and open more possibilities for you.

For License Visit: https://lynanalytics.gumroad.com/l/faire

This extension works in mostly three different layout / pages of Faire:

ðŸ‘‰ Search: When you search in Faire using a keyword "Lyn Analytics for Faire" automatically detects the page type and triggers it's analytical features. It does not starts immediately; just shows that it's available and ready to perform on that page. Upon clicking 'Start Analytics'; it starts it's magic and shows you some very important data, adds up some filter and sorting capabilities and many more.
ðŸ‘‰ Category: Works same as described in 'Search' section.
ðŸ‘‰ Brand Page: Works same as described in 'Search' section.

Besides mentioned three pages this extension also enables a feature that shows total search result beside the Faire suggested keywords when you start typing in search field.


Now Let's talk about the features 'Lyn Analytics for Faire' provides to you:

âœ… Filter: Lyn Analytics for Faire improves your experience by adding our own filtering system on the search result ( current page ) based on 'Top Shop' and 'Best Seller'. This helps you filter the selected information. This can be very useful for research purposes.

âœ… Sorting: It includes sorting the search results ( current page ) based on
    - Retail Price
    - Wholesale Price
    - Order Quantity
    - Order Amount
    - Reviews
    - Badges
    - Lead Time
    - Brand Reviews

âœ… Rating & Reviews : When enabled, our extension adds a nicely designed useful utility section with each listing that shows the total rating and review each product and their brand received. You can browse this data when visiting the Product's Details page or Brand page. We just brought this data outside for your conveniences and let you filter the results based on these.

âœ… Live Products: With each product you can see how many other live product is available for that product's brand. This can help you get an idea of big is the brand is and other decisions as well.

âœ… Order Criteria: It enables you to view the minimum order quantity and minimum order amount for any individual listing / product. You can optimize your listings based on this as well.

âœ… Best Seller : Each listing indicates if it's a 'Maker Best Seller' or not. If it is you can see a check sign otherwise a cross sign.

âœ… Top shop: Each listing indicates if it's a 'Top Shop' or not. If it is you can see a check sign otherwise a cross sign.

âœ… Location: Listing includes two small chips with country short code that indicates the 'Ships From' and 'Based in' information. This can give you an idea where the brand is based in and from where it ships it's products.

âœ… Review List: Each listing has a dedicated dialog / modal window provided by 'Lyn Analytics for Faire'. It contains all the reviews for that specific product. You can see the whole list by clicking on the dialog trigger button represented as 'Expansion' icon when hovered over. This review list also shows you the 'Top 10 Repeat Reviews'. It also concludes another feature named 'Frequently Bought From'; this data shows you the city names from where that product is most bought from. We know how important this data for you; so do you. Have fun with this one.

âœ… Brand Details: At the left side of the dialog; you can browse a list of very important brand details for example instagram handle, where the brand is started, if they showroom, instagram follower count ( if available ) etc.


..... and many more features and data are shown. Check out the extension by installing in your google chrome browser.
